message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it's a great deal considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I think $120 would be a fair price for the product considering its value to me.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. While I understand your perspective on the price, I'm looking for something closer to $180. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $150.
